mapper.select: SELECT movie_comment.id as id, movie_comment.content as content, movie_comment.comment_user_id as comment_user_id, movie_comment.movie_id as movie_id, movie_comment.like_count as like_count, movie_comment.unlike_count as unlike_count, movie_comment.create_time as create_time, movie_comment.update_time as update_time, users.username as comment_user_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM movie_reply WHERE movie_reply.movie_comment_id = movie_comment.id) AS reply_count FROM movie_comment LEFT JOIN users ON movie_comment.comment_user_id = users.id WHERE movie_comment.deleted = 0 ORDER BY movie_comment.update_time DESC
